value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot. value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Power BI DAX RelatedTable Function   Get the subtable related to the current row
value.excerpt: There are multiple functions that can help when you work with tables that are connected through relationships. One of these functions is Relatedtable.
